DOC.brief_summary: This study randomize control trial compare effect zinc , beta-carotene , Vitamin D3 supplementation pregnant woman preterm birth . The measured outcome zinc , vitamin A , 25 ( OH ) D level serum placenta , MyD88 , TRIF , NFκB , IL-1β level placenta .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Zinc , β-carotene , Vitamin D3 Preterm Delivery Through Placental MyD88 , TRIF , NFkB , IL-1β
DOC.detailed_description: The research hold Cipto Mangunkusumo General Budi Kemuliaan Hospital . Each participant group give medication preterm birth hospital protocol , include nifedipine 4x10 mg tocolytic agent , dexamethasone 2x6 mg intravenous 2 day aim support lung maturation , antibiotic . Then , blood sample obtain zinc , vitamin A 25 ( OH ) D level examination . Randomly , subject divide 2 group group whose give oral zinc 50 mg/day , oral beta-carotene 25,000 IU oral vitamin D3 50,000 IU/week supplementation , group give intervention . Each participant observe delivery . After delivery , level zinc , vitamin A , 25 ( OH ) D serum placenta measure , well level MyD88 , TRIF , NFκB , IL-1β placenta .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman preterm birth 2834 week gestational age Multiple pregnancy Drug allergy Intra Uterine Growth Retardation ( IUGR ) detect Congenital malformation fetus find Preterm Premature Rupture Membrane ( PPROM ) Maternal complication gestational hypertension , preeclampsia , gestational diabetes mellitus , heart disease , infection , autoimmune disease
